--- In gladiator@y..., Warren Whippo <usaf_one@y...> wrote:
> That's not true, we care, but we just don't respond
> back :P
> To me it sounds like a good idea, but I think it's
> unecessary because you can only get that high of level
> if you cheat (Am I right?). Anyways I like it.

Define cheating.  My torture scenario #401 (the one that takes forever 
to load) has enough gold in it to create a rather large army or to 
create one very powerfull single player.  Of course, I'll get to the 
disadvantages of single player teams pretty soon.
